title: Coldplay discography
summary: British rock band Coldplay have released nine studio albums, six live albums, six compilation albums, four video albums, sixteen extended plays, thirty seven singles, fourteen promotional singles, three charity singles and sixty two music videos. The band have sold over 100 million albums worldwide,[1] being the most successful group of the 21st century.[2][3] In addition, they have achieved nine million-selling singles in the United Kingdom,[4] and sold 18.2 million albums and 33.6 million song downloads in the United States.[5]
